column4: could someone give my an idea on > running applications without a gui > for instance id like to set up firestarter on my server however havnt found much since most how tos require at least a minimalistic DE like X
there are some consolebased firewall tools I recall.. but never used them.
you could ssh to the box from a different linux machine that has X, and perhaps run firestarter and see the gui that way
you can FOrward X apps  and guis over ssh. I do it all the time. ssh -X remotebox, run the app.
